CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7750SRa', "No Accessories available for 7750 SR-a 4/8",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7210SAS-R',"No Accessoires available for 7210 SAS-R6",""))
CustomField.label: Accessories
